text: Abdelkebir Ouaddar (born 15 July 1962) is a Moroccan equestrian. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the individual jumping event, in which he tied for 50th place. He was the flag bearer for Morocco at the Parade of Nations. Ouaddar also participated at the 2014 World Equestrian Games in Normandy, France, where he placed 13th individually and 27th teamwise. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Moroccan male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Morocco Category:Equestrians at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Competitors at the 2019 African Games Category:African Games silver medalists for Morocco Category:African Games medalists in equestrian Category:African Games competitors for Morocco
title: Abdelkebir Ouaddar
